rows.label: tlk45200111_02_msg0001
rows.name:
The heart of the Driver decides what
Blade comes out of a Core Crystal.
Did you know that?!

rows.label: tlk45200111_02_msg0002
rows.name:
It's not just stuff like weapons and
elements that change, nu-uh!

rows.label: tlk45200111_02_msg0003
rows.name:
Even the way they grow changes!
There are like, as many different
Blades as there are people!

rows.label: tlk45200111_02_msg0004
rows.name:
Oh, oh, and if you keep trying to bond
over and over, then sooner or later,
you'll meet a super awesome Blade!
